name: In re APPOINTMENT TO DISCIPLINARY BOARD
name_abbreviation: In re Appointment to Disciplinary Board

parties: In re APPOINTMENT TO DISCIPLINARY BOARD.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
AND NOW, this 9th day of December, 1993, Carolyn Wray Rudnitsky, Snyder County, is hereby appointed as a member of the Disciplinary Board for a term of three years commencing December 15, 1993.
Non-lawyer member.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

casebody.head_matter:
635 A.2d 1028
In re APPOINTMENT TO DISCIPLINARY BOARD.
No. 165 Disciplinary Board Appointment Docket.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Dec. 9, 1993.
